newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch post Dfl 2.6 billion April trade surplus.
newsitem.headline: Dutch post Dfl 2.6 billion April trade surplus.

text.p: The Dutch trade surplus narrowed to a provisional 2.6 billion guilders in April 1997 from 2.9 billion in March, the Central Bureau of Statistics (CBS) said.
DUTCH TRADE BALANCE April 97 March 97 April 96
NOTE - Merchandise trade in billions of guilders.
CBS said that the value of both imports and exports rose 18 percent year-on-year in April.
"This growth was partly accelerated due to price changes and exchange rate effects and the fact that April this year had one more working day than last year," it said.
